

data <- lapply(seq_len(2L), 
  function(n) {
    x <- fxlsx("./order_material/mcp.M111.014647-4.xlsx", n, startRow = 3)
    dplyr::filter(x, grpl(Division, "matrisome", TRUE))
  })
names(data) <- c("human", "mouse")
data
saveRDS(data, "../../data/matrisome_small.rds")
